relevant_findings.description: Document discusses a covert CIA employee undergoing sensitive assignment training
relevant_findings.direct_quote: The Subject is a covert employee of this Agency now in the United States for four weeks training and being considered for Staff C/JCB in a highly sensitive assignment.
relevant_findings.significance: Reveals internal CIA process for recruiting and training covert operatives during early 1950s, providing context for agency operational methods

relevant_findings.description: Detailed tracking of covert employee's status and potential future assignments
relevant_findings.direct_quote: The Subject is still a covert employee of this Agency, is now in the United States (New York City) on home leave, and is scheduled to report to Washington, D.C., to commence four weeks of covert training: 6 July 1951.
relevant_findings.significance: Demonstrates meticulous internal monitoring and documentation of covert personnel movements

relevant_findings.description: Ongoing surveillance and investigation of subject's potential communist activities
relevant_findings.direct_quote: The people on this list are being contacted for use on a continuing basis in their specific cases rising in their particular area of knowledge.
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates ongoing monitoring of subject's potential communist connections

relevant_findings.description: Interagency communication about subject's potential future assignment
relevant_findings.direct_quote: The subject's use in the proposed Staff C project is still in the planning stage, but the assignment that the Subject is being considered for is a highly sensitive one
relevant_findings.significance: Suggests potential covert operational planning involving the subject

relevant_findings.description: Immigration and naturalization inquiries about subject
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Memorandum of 9 June 1951 requesting further information regarding their memorandum of 16 June 1951 on the Subject
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates ongoing official interest in subject's immigration status and background

relevant_findings.description: Document discusses coordination between agencies regarding a subject's location and security status
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization has indicated in a conversation that INS had been able to locate the Subject's location
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates inter-agency communication and tracking of an individual (possibly related to Oswald)

relevant_findings.description: Reference to an agency and subject's father providing location information
relevant_findings.direct_quote: the agency in (Gaboa, Panama, Canal Zone) which appears in the subject's father's information
relevant_findings.significance: Potential geographic and familial connections being investigated
